thread.title: Jamie O'Hara FINALLY sees his sons nearly two weeks after leaving CBB house
thread.title_full: Jamie O'Hara FINALLY sees his sons nearly two weeks after leaving CBB house

author: Alistair McGeorge
title: Jamie O'Hara FINALLY sees his sons nearly two weeks after leaving CBB house
text:
Jamie O'Hara FINALLY sees his sons nearly two weeks after leaving CBB house The footballer has been reunited with his "three heroes" after complaining about Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jamie O’Hara reunited with his sons after being evicted from CBB Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jamie O'Hara has met up with his children for what appears to be the first time since being evicted from the Celebrity Big Brother house last month. 
The 30-year-old footballer documented his reunion with his three boys on social media, after talking candidly about how much he pays his ex-wife Danielle Lloyd for their maintenance during his time in the house. 
Posting a snap of himself with Archie, Harry and George on Instagram, Jamie captioned it: "Family weekend nothing better than having my boys in my arms, now gonna jump around the place and prob break my ankle #boys #family #jumpgiants ." Jamie shared this snap of himself and a friend with their kids (Photo: jamie.ohara/Instagram) 
He also tweeted a selfie of the four of them enjoying breakfast with the caption: "Service station stop with my little hero's." 
Jamie then took to Snapchat to show his followers what he was getting up to with his sons - which included a full run-down of what they'd all eaten for breakfast followed by a playing session at an indoor gymnastics hall. He and his three boys have been reunited following his CBB stint (Photo: @Mrjamieohara1 /Twitter) 
It comes after Danielle's fans trolled Jamie after she revealed her fiancé Michael had taught youngest son George to ride a bike. 
The star split from Jamie in 2014 after two years of marriage, following allegations he cheated on her. 
Proud mum Danielle shared a video with her Instagram followers showing her boy cycling through the house, and revealed it was Michael who taught him. Danielle is so proud of Michael (Photo: missdlloyd/Instagram) 
"In shock this morning didn't even know Michael had taught George to ride his bike," she wrote. "Proud mummy." 
Many fans were quick to praise her son on the achievement, and applaud the sweet boy for how well he's doing. 
"How lovely, no stopping him now, move everything in sight," joked one commenter, while another appeared to hint that Michael was stepping on toes by teaching his stepson the skill with Jamie missing out. Danielle Lloyd didn't even know Michael had taught her boy (Photo: PA) Jamie O'Hara was trolled by her fans (Photo: Rex Features) 
However, others took the opportunity to criticise Jamie, who has been spotted partying with Calum Best after leaving the CBB house. 
"Dads been to busy embarrassing himself in CBB ," claimed one follower. Danielle Lloyd and her fiance Michael She split from Jamie in 2014 (Photo: WireImage) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
